required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: To Evaluate the Effect of Gemfibrozil on the Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of a Single Dose of AZD1656
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomised, Open, Placebo Controlled, Two-way Crossover Phase I Study in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Patients Treated With Metformin to Evaluate the Effect of Gemfibrozil on the Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of a Single Dose of AZD1656

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of Gemfibrozil on the Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of a Single Dose of AZD1656

primary_outcome.measure: PK of AZD1656 when administered with placebo or following repeated dosing of gemfibrozil by assessment of AUC and Cmax.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Serial blood samples will be drawn on day 4-6 period 1 and 2 from pre-dose to 48 h post AZD1656 administration.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK of AZD1656 when administered with placebo or following repeated dosing of germfibrozil by assessment of AUC0-t, tmax, t1/2, CL/F and Vz/F
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Serial blood samples will be drawn on day 4-6 period 1 and 2 from pre-dose to 48 h post AZD1656 administration.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK of AZD1656 metabolite, when AZD1656 is administered with placebo or following repeated dosing of gemfibrozil by assessment of AUC, AUC0-t, Cmax, tmax, t1/2
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Serial blood samples will be drawn on day 4-6 period 1 and 2 from pre-dose to 48 h post AZD1656 administration.

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety of AZD1656 when administered with placebo or following repeated dosing of gemfibrozil by assessment of electrocardiogram, weight, pulse, blood pressure, laboratory variables including 24-h plasma glucose, physical examination and adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Paper ECG, BP/pulse preentry, pre-dose,day 4, period 1 and 2, and follow-up on day +7-10 days. Weight, physical examination preentry and pre-dose (period 1 and 2), follow-up. 7-point plasma-glucose on pre-entry, day 3 and 5, period 1 and 2.

arm_group.description: Gemfibrozil day 1-5 + AZD1656 day 4, 1 week without, Placebo day 1-5 + AZD1656 day 4
Placebo day 1-5 + AZD1656 day 4, 1 week without, Gemfibrozil day 1-5 + AZD1656 day 4

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients with confirmed Type 2 diabetes mellitus for at least 1 year and treated with metformin.
- Body mass index between ≥19 and ≤42 kg/m2.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Intake of another investigational drug within the last 30 days prior to enrolment.
- Clinically significant illness or clinically relevant trauma.

overall_official.affiliation: J.J. Berzelius Clinical Research Center AB
